text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmm… so the log house… is over there? That means there's just a bit to go…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But… it really is a huge star… But, thanks to this sled I don't have to worry about that. And the snowfall has lightened too…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'm going to answer your prayers soon everyone… Just wait a bit longer…!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ah! I see something over there, is that Oguri!? Oguri ☆

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She's going to make it back safely…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: You can do it, Oguri-san ♪ Hey everyone, why don't we go and cheer her on?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Huff… fuh…!

text_block_list.name: Fan's Children
text_block_list.text: Oguri! You can do it!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I can hear them…! Everyone, just a bit further and…
(Thud… !)

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …!? My foot…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: This is bad! Oguri-san, that's a cliff! Get back, you'll fall!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: （Fall…）

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap was unable to gain a lead. She went for a drastic strategy… but it must have been too much for her.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Ah… Oguri really couldn't do it, could she? That being said, she seemed as though she was giving it her all! No, she definitely was!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: （No… I don't want to fall any lower. Instead, I'll make up for all my failures by flying forward!)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: That's right… all I need to do is take off! Haaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Hayahide & Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha… she's flying!?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I can do it…! I can bring it to them…!!

text_block_list.name: Fan's Children
text_block_list.text: Woah, it's Santa-san! Oguri became Santa-san!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Woah… ☆ Oguri-san really became Santa-san…! Hey, Marve-chin, is that…!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yup…! It's so dazzling, so heart-racing, so marvelous! We've finally found the miracle we were looking for ☆ ★

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Alright… I've finally done it!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Woah! The tree outside finally has a star…! It's so beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: It really is an amazing star. It's perfect for a Christmas spent with all of you… Thank you so much.

text_block_list.name: Fan's Child
text_block_list.text: Thank you too, Oguri! You looked so cool out there! You really became Santa-san!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: R-Really? I was so focused that I don't really remember what happened…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: You… were just like Santa, guiding his sled through the night sky. You ended up giving us another gift.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A present…? But I didn't bring you any…

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Inspiration is what you brought us, Oguri-san. Seeing you fly through the sky reminded me of how moved I was when I first witnessed one of your races.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Not only that, it reaffirmed something in me. In your next race… You'll definitely show me something even more magnificent than you showed tonight, Oguri-san.

text_block_list.name: Fan Representative
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san, you truly are amazing!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …! Thanks… But you're the ones who have given me a gift.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You all gathered here today for my sake… and I'm very grateful for that. Your support, your expectations, they're what help me continue running. So…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I promise I will show you all something amazing in the next race. So I'm counting on you all to continue believing in me… Merry Christmas!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Merry Christmas!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'll be sure to have a talk with Oguri-san later regarding her recklessness… I guess that concludes that, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Sure does. And now you're free from being Santa.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: We don't need to be here anymore, so let's head back.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Taishin, wait. You helped me create this miracle. I expect you have something to say.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Don't get cocky now… dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Jeez… you're the one not being honest now. Well anyways, it looks like our time to shine has ended, so let's…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wait up! This miracle isn't over yet! Everyone, come outside ♪

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Woah… It's so beautiful… It was so white before…

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: A sky filled with stars came in ☆ Oguri's run managed to kick away the snow clouds ★

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: No… It wasn't just my running. It was thanks to everyone's wishes that this happened.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hayahide, Taishin, Mayano, Marvelous. I have to thank you all as well… So let's enjoy this party together!
